indexer

Class ExtractedInfoRetriever

  • java.lang.Object
    • indexer.ExtractedInfoRetriever

  • public class ExtractedInfoRetriever
extends Object
    Enables searching/loading of extracted values from the web service.
    Author:
    dganguly

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtractedInfoRetriever()
      Called from the server side.
      ExtractedInfoRetriever(String propFile)
      Called from the stand-alone application to save the extracted info objects that could later be loaded from the server side of the web application.

    • Method Summary

      Constructs a 'ResearchDoc' object from a given file name.
      String retrieveHTMLFormatted(String attribId)

      • ExtractedInfoRetriever

        public ExtractedInfoRetriever(String propFile)
                       throws Exception

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveDocInfo

        public ResearchDoc retrieveDocInfo(String docName)
                            throws Exception
        Constructs a 'ResearchDoc' object from a given file name. The 'ResearchDoc' object replicates the in-memory representation of a Lucene document object comprising of fields, such as title, authors, introduction etc.
        Parameters:
        docName - Name of the document
        Returns:
        A 'ResearchDoc' object.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • retrieve

        public org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs retrieve(String attribId)
                                          throws Exception
        Retrieves a list of top ranked documents (passages) given an attribute id to extract.
        Parameters:
        attribId -
        Returns:
        A 'TopDocs' object.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • retrieveHTMLFormatted

        public String retrieveHTMLFormatted(String attribId)
                             throws Exception
        Called from the web interface to obtain the HTML representation of a list of extracted values.
        Parameters:
        attribId - Attribute id to extract.
        Returns:
        An HTML formatted string that is returned to a servlet implementation.
        Throws:
        Exception

           throws Exception
